name: arrayEvery
syntax: arrayEvery(array array, function(item, [index, [array]]) closure, [boolean parallel], [number maxThreads])
description: returns true if every closure returns true, otherwise false

params.name: closure
params.description: A function / closure with the signature: `boolean function (any item, [numeric index], [array array])`

params.name: parallel
params.description: When `true` the items can be executed in parallel

params.name: maxThreads
params.description: The number of threads to use when `parallel=true`

links.title: Map, Reduce and other Higher Order Functions
links.description: A Primer for map, reduce, filter, and Higher Order Functions in general.
